title: Self-Directed Learning: Short-Term Workshop for Strengthening Adult Scientists' Capabilities Based on Learning Trajectories (LT)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computation skills and experience in scientific problem-solving
context.additional_context: A customized LT (Learning Track) study for adult learners, exploring the effectiveness of traditional step-by-step educational approaches while utilizing smartphone-based activity materials.

learning_goals: Learners can explain problem-solving strategies using two-level prerequisite content with 80% accuracy after understanding the LT approach.
Participants can quantitatively and qualitatively analyze experimental results on LT-based learning efficiency through formative assessments within the first week.
By the end of the training, learners can develop concrete implementation plans for applying LT models to their specialized field (science).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
